Hopzilla.description: Unleash the hoppy beast with this intense and aromatic double IPA.

Velvet Lager.description: A lager so smooth and velvety, it's like a luxurious sip of beer perfection.

Enchanted Abbey.description: Embark on a mystical journey with this enchanting Belgian tripel, brimming with complex flavors.

Mozzarella Sticks.description: Golden-fried mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.

Loaded Nachos.description: Crispy tortilla chips piled high with melted cheese, jalapenos, sour cream, and guacamole.

Classic Cheeseburger.description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles.

Mushroom Swiss Burger.description: Grilled beef patty with saut√©ed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli.

BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork smothered in tangy BBQ sauce, topped with coleslaw.

Caesar Salad.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, shaved parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
